actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow the deduction of expenditures for food and lodging primarily for medical care.

summary.text: Allows an income tax deduction under the Internal Revenue Code for expenditures while away from home for food and lodging primarily for medical care. (Amends 26 U.S.C. 213)

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow the deduction of expenditures for food and lodging primarily for medical care.
